info.readme:
This is the umbraco's ultimate pickers with a really minor change. When you don't specify a Parent Id, it will assume the current Node Id as the parent Id. I find this usefull in a multi-language site.
The code is the one in the umbraco's repository.
Kudo's to the Umbraco Developer Team and to Ron Brouwer with the Axendo Ultimate Picker XPath, from where I got the ideia. (http://our.umbraco.org/projects/backoffice-extensions/axendo-ultimate-picker-xpath)
.Net Framework Version: 3.5 (C#) Tested on Umbraco: 4.5.2 Developed in Visual Studio 2010
